mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO boardNo, BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, BOARD_WRITER boardWriter, ORIGIN_NAME originName, COUNT count, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "createDate" FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{bno} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME ) VALUES( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContent}, #{originName}, #{changeName} )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO replyNo, REPLY_CONTENT replyContent, REPLY_WRITER replyWriter, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createDate FROM REPLY WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY( REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_WRITER, REF_BNO ) VALUES( SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, #{replyWriter}, #{refBno} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, ORIGIN_NAME, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
